front.title: SNMP MIB for SLP Directory Agents

abstract.t: This memo defines a Management Information Base (MIB) for the Service Location Protocol (SLP). The MIB describes the statistics and alerts required to allow management of Service Location Protocol enabled entities. The SLP MIB conforms to the Structure of Management Information (SMI), as described in RFC 1902. It is intended for use with the Simple Network Management Protocol, version 2.
